entry.title: HealthCare.gov 2.0
entry.content:
HealthCare.gov 2.0

Last fall, I was honored to be on the "tech surge" team of outsiders that helped fixed HealthCare.gov. I was on-site in the D.C. area for almost all of November and December. I mostly helped with tasks related to test automation.

As of this week, I'm rejoining the HealthCare.gov effort. I'm taking another leave of absence from Sauce Labs, to help the Marketplace 2.0 team.

23 June 2014
